title: Account Syncing !
body: Yeah so apparently I have to sync my account to the boards but I don't know how (and I have a pretty lengthy post I wanna post on the boards). Could someone help me?

replies.body: Your post here should do that!  We also have a [syncing tool ](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/fos1aFEB-boards-profile-syncing-tool)pinned to the boards to do it automatically as well.  ^^
Ok i just found out posting this synced my account so nevermind lol
